#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
          string s;
          int n,i;
          
          scanf("%d", &n);
          
          while ( n-- ) {
                  cin >> s;
                  i = 0;
                  while ( i < s.size()-1 ) {
                     if ( (s[i]-48)*10 + s[i+1]-48 >= 65 && (s[i]-48)*10 + s[i+1]-48 <= 99 ) {
                                       cout << (char)((s[i]-48)*10 + s[i+1]-48);
                                       i += 2;
                     }else {
                                       if ( (s[i]-48)*10 + s[i+1]-48 == 32 ) {
                                                         cout << " ";
                                                         i += 2;
                                       }
                                       else {
                                               cout << (char)((s[i]-48)*100 + (s[i+1]-48)*10 + s[i+2]-48);       
                                               i += 3;
                                       }
                     }
                  }
                  cout << endl;
          }
          return 0;
}
